title: That Guy
description:
Sarah Langs and Buster talk about the Astros’ winning ways, Yordan Álvarez with another home run while his team trailed and the Phillies winning despite being out-homered. Then, Karl Ravech discusses Buster’s Álvarez comparison, Dansby Swanson’s catch and Manny Machado’s maturity. Next, Hembo on the average fastball velocity in the playoffs, Framer Valdez’s diabolical curveball and why Carlos Correa is the prize of another loaded shortstop class. Later, Mandy Bell on how the rainout actually helps the Guardians’ rotation, the most important bat in Cleveland’s lineup and the half marathon she’s running for Sarah. You can donate to support Sarah here. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Sarah Langs on another go-ahead Yordan Álvarez home run; Karl Ravech on Manny Machado’s maturity; Hembo on Carlos Correa heading to free agency; Mandy Bell on the most important bat in Cleveland’s lineup
